title: Tribal leaders, members react to pope's apology on schools
content:
1. Tribal leaders, members react to pope's apology on schools  The Associated Press
  2. The Pope went to Canada to apologize. For some indigenous school survivors, he triggered more pain  CNN
  3. Pope Apologizes For Catholic Church's Role In Abuse Of Indigenous Children  NBC News
  4. Brutal heat wave continues, MLB Hall of Fame adds 7: 5 Things podcast  USA TODAY
  5. 'I am deeply sorry': Pope Francis apologises for abuse at church schools in Canada  Guardian News
